meanings.definition: A type of aromatic plant with small yellow flowers.
meanings.sent1: The gardener planted santolina in the herb garden.
meanings.sent2: The santolina in the yard attracted bees with its bright flowers.
meanings.sent3: The santolina plant whispered to the other herbs, 'I smell the best!'
meanings.sent4: Her love for gardening bloomed like a field of santolina in full sun.
meanings.sent5: The scent of santolina filled the air, calming everyone around.

meanings.definition: The dried leaves of the santolina plant used in herbal medicine.
meanings.sent1: She brewed a tea with santolina to help with her cold.
meanings.sent2: The herbalist recommended santolina for its healing properties.
meanings.sent3: The santolina leaves danced in the jar, ready to be brewed.
meanings.sent4: His knowledge of herbal remedies was as vast as a field of santolina.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of santolina filled the room, soothing all who entered.
